hero.headline: News & Moments
hero.subheadline: Celebrating our winners, community events, and latest offers.

posts.title: 60 Seconds of Free Shopping
posts.summary: Witness the excitement as our lucky Loyalty Card winner raced through the aisles. In just one minute, she managed to grab household essentials worth over KSh 15,000 completely free!

posts.title: Grand Opening Celebration
posts.summary: We are thrilled to announce the opening of our newest branch! Join us for exclusive deals and a tour of the state-of-the-art facility designed for your comfort.

posts.title: CSR Excellence Award
posts.summary: Powerstar Supermarkets has been recognized for outstanding contribution to community education. We are proud to support local schools and student scholarships.

posts.title: The Big Christmas Savings Bonanza
posts.summary: The festive season brought incredible joy and massive discounts. Families across Kenya saved big on unga bundles, cooking oil, and holiday feasts.

posts.title: Our Farm-to-Fork Promise
posts.summary: We partner with over 50 local farmers to bring you crisp vegetables and ripe fruits daily. By cutting out the middleman, we ensure farmers get paid fairly.
